ISSUE.TITLE: Error starting in node version v15.14.0 for package azure-function-express@2.0.0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** please provide the following details : NocoDB used as docker : false NocoDB version : 0.9.31 Database used in NC_DB URL : none OS on which NocoDB is running : Node.js version if running as node : Database version : **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to packages/nocodb/ 2. run `yarn install` ``` error azure-function-express@2.0.0: The engine "node" is incompatible with this module. Expected version ">=6.11.2 <11". Got "15.14.0" error Found incompatible module. ``` Give that Node v14 is the active LTS version, shouldn't dependencies support Node versions >=14? Node v10 just reached end of life. **Expected behavior** Install all packages **Screenshots** Node version : **v15.14.0** Arch type: **arm64** Platform: **mac** Docker: **false** packageVersion: **0.9.31**
